name: Shooting star (dutchlish)
description:
Shooting star

Click anywhere, drag away from the desired direction and release mouse to add force to the shooting star orbiting the earth.

Collect the star collectibles before the time's up to increase the length of your trail, the quicker you collect it, the more points you get.

Don't crash into the earth or go too far out of orbit or it's game over.

NOTE: One known bug, the star collectible MAY still spawn underneath the planet, - then you can't collect it and have to crash into the planet or go out of orbit to start again.
